responses: Did that make you happy, buying something? Owning things is the key to happiness. It must be, or I'm wasting my life. Please tell me it is. Please?
Why would you buy that, you should have bought the other thing instead!
Thank you for your purchase, would you like paper or plastic with your existentialist concept?
Giving into your vices relieves stress, that's why you lose stress when you purchase these things. Trust me, it totally makes sense, and if it doesn't, you probably just don't get it.
Way to do the thing! I'm sure it was worth it.
